event.title: opened a mill at the site in 1861

data.event: The settlement began when Judson Dakin and J.C. Wemple opened a mill at the site in 1861.
The first post office at Milford opened in 1864, and closed for a period during 1879.
The first post office at Milford opened in 1864, and closed for a period during 1879.
The 2010 United States Census reported that Milford had a population of 167.
The Census reported that 167 people (100% of the population) lived in households, 0 (0%) lived in non-institutionalized group quarters, and 0 (0%) were institutionalized.
